highlight.delete.fail.msg: SmartItemHighlight failed to delete the condition due to a file system error.
highlight.disable_update_file.fail.msg: When toggling this condition, SmartItemHighlight failed to save the new condition data, as a result it may not be enabled/disabled when the game restarts.
config.create_description: Create a new item highlight condition.
config.create_fail_2: Could not save the new condition.
